title: Bank of Montreal Named Top 25 Dividend Stock With 4.31% Yield (BMO) - Nasdaq.com
text: Bank of Montreal (Quebec) (TSX: BMO.TO ) has been named as a Top 25 dividend stock, according the most recent Canada Stock Channel''DividendRank'' report. The report noted that among the coverage universe, BMO shares displayed both attractive valuation metrics and strong profitability metrics. For example, the recent BMO share price of $95.50 represents a price-to-book ratio of 1.4 and an annual dividend yield of 4.31% - by comparison, the average company in Canada Stock Channel's coverage universe yields 4.3% and trades at a price-to-book ratio of 1.6. The report also cited the strong quarterly dividend history at Bank of Montreal (Quebec), and favorable long-term multi-year growth rates in key fundamental data points.
